entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
